title: Badge
description: Displays a badge or a component that looks like a badge.

body.raw: ### Installation CLI Manual ```bash npx shadcn@latest add "https://designali.in/r/badge" ``` Copy and paste the following code into your project. Update the import paths to match your project setup. ### Props | Prop | Type | Description | Default | | --------- | ------ | ----------------------------- | ------- | | variant | any | Width of the dot pattern | 16 | | size | any | Height of the dot pattern | 16 | | className | string | Class name of the dot pattern | - |
